maqras.text: My had him thrown up into zbehnut exhausted
My had strom edible ovocie grown for him
Potom my sent him 100000 inak
They robit verit my let them enjoy this zivot
Ziadat them if tvoj Lord have dcera chvila they have syn
My create angels robit bol zena? they svedok ze
Indeed they grossly blaspheme when they say
GOD begotten SYN. Indeed they bol liars
He zvolit si girls chlapec
Co bol zlo s tvoj logic
Why ona nie berie heed
Ona have any proof
Show us tvoj rezervovat si if ona bol truthful
They vecer invented zvlastny vztah medzi Him jinns. jinns zauzlit lenze they bol subservient
GOD glorified DALEKO ICH REKLAMOVAT
Len GOD's servants je devoted do Him alone saved
Indeed ona co ona kult
Nie impozantny anything Him
Len ona burn Hell
Each jeden z us has specific zamestnanie
My bol arrangers
My duly glorified (our Lord)
They pouzivat say
Had my received toje spravne instrukcia z our rodicia
My bol worshipers; devoted do GOD alone
they disbelieved they will iste zalozit out
Our decision already decreed for our servants posol
They bol iste victors
Our vojak bol winners
So disregard them for awhile
Watch them; they i watch
they challenge our retribution
When it hits them 1 dni bol chudobny dni; they sufficiently warned
Disregard them for awhile
Watch them; they i watch
Glory bol tvoj Lord velka Lord daleko ich reklamovat
Peace bol posol
Chvalit bol GOD Lord universe
(Saad) Quran contains proof
Those disbelieve plunged into arrogance defiance
Vela generation them my annihilated They vola sa for pomoc v vain
They zazrak lenze warner pojdem them them. disbelievers said kuzelnik liar
he robit gods into 1 god This bol skutocne strange
leaders zahlasit Ist steadfastly persevere kult tvoj gods This bol co desired
My never heard this nabozenstvo our otca. This bol laicky
Robit proof pod him us? Indeed they bol doubtful z Moj proof Indeed they nie lenze chut Moj retribution
Robit they own treasures zlutovanie tvoj Lord Almighty Grantor
they possess sovereignty z heavens zem everything them? Let them pomoc
Radsej whatever forces they muster -Vecer if all ich parties banded dohromady! -defeated
Disbelieving them bol ludia Noah â€˜Aad mocny Pharaoh
(I Thamoud ludia Lot dwellers Les Midyan;) those bol opponents
Each z them disbelieved posol thus Moj retribution bol inevitable
These ludia expect single blow z kto they never recover
They challenged Our Lord robit ona nie rush retribution us Dni Reckoning
Je chory v the face z ich utterances zapamatat si our servant David resourceful; he bol obedient
My committed mountains jeho servis glorifying him night dni
I birds committed serve him; all bol obedient do him
My zosilnit jeho kingship endowed him s wisdom dobry logic
